function.description: That function allows to add a function to four inner predefined hook queues; it is possible to define through that method even new hooks and trigger execution anywhere in your code using the function hookCheck. Note that 'onBeforeRender', 'onAfterRender', 'onBeforeParse', 'onAfterParse' are existent inner hooks used at parse and render time.

params.param: the object literal containing hooked functions
hook the function even if the hook is not in the expected set ['onBeforeRender', 'onAfterRender', 'onBeforeParse', 'onAfterParse']
